name: King Of The Court
description:
"You miss 100% of the shots you don't take." -Wayne Gretzky

Even though the great one was talking about hockey, it is as true a lesson for basketball and life in general.

Practising all night in the court located in the heart of an apartment building complex, the player continues to fire shot after shot into the net. Earn the title of 'King of the Court' with this fun and short basketball game.

How many baskets can you score?

Click=Shoot

Spacebar=Jump

WASD=Move Player

P=Pause Menu

ESC=Release Mouse

Follow me on Twitter for more: @danobrien_dev
